result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
result.translation: 51.Kaadu faxinninoy kulli (ummaan) magaalah marah farmoytay Yallih digaalak ken meesiisay Yallâ fanah ken seeca keenih ruubak nen, kinnih immay Nabii Mucammadow baaxô bagul enni iyya marah inkih koo rubne.
